channel.title: Connection error - Retrying in [Seconds]
channel.description: Ok well im hosting a server on my Windows vista computer and when i tryed to put the client on my Windows 7 64 bit laptop this happened: [img]http://i55.tinypic.com/51dllh.png[/img] Ive been doin some research and from what i found it is that my cache cant be located, altho ive done some testing and it works perfectly fine on my m8s windows vista laptop (not 64 bit) so im not sure..Could it still not b able to find the cache even tho it is in the client folder
